Title: The Vest
Plot: In the wake of the explosion, Saul finds Carrie hospitalized and manic, but realizes her chaotic theories have merit; before his congressional campaign begins, Brody takes his family on a weekend trip to Gettysburg, where he retrieves an important item.
GuestStars: Jamey Sheridan, Hrach Titizian, James Rebhorn, Nasser Faris, Charles Borland, Benjamin Pelteson
